arts.ttl: 'Mid-table, mediocre Norwich' - City fans react to Plymouth defeat
arts.sum: Norwich City fans react to the Canaries' 2-1 Championship loss to Plymouth Argyle at Home Park.

arts.ttl: Ryan Hardie brace earns bottom club Plymouth victory over Norwich
arts.sum: Hardie struck in the 24th and 29th minutes and despite a 46th-minute reply from in-form Josh Sargent, Argyle held on for an unlikely victory.

arts.ttl: MATCHDAY LIVE: Plymouth Argyle v Norwich City
arts.sum: Follow live updates via our live matchday blog above and join the debate with chief Norwich City reporter Connor Southwell live from Home Park.

arts.ttl: Joe Pateman: What price would you put on Josh Sargent's head?
arts.sum: The game against West Brom had that ‘last day of the season feel’ for the first 90 minutes or so, until Josh Sargent notched his ninth goal in 11 games and Carrow Road erupted - says Norwich City fan columnist Joe Pateman.

arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney urged to quit management by former Manchester United team-mate in savage dig after his disastrous spells at Birmingham and Plymouth
arts.sum: The Frenchman joked that he has told the Englishman to give up on his dream of coaching and cited his recent disastrous spell with Birmingham City .

arts.ttl: Gyabi continues: Plymouth Argyle team news and predicted XI to face Norwich City
arts.sum: The latest Plymouth Argyle team news as Miron Muslic’s side face Norwich City in the Championship on Saturday. The post Gyabi continues: Plymouth Argyle team news and predicted XI to face Norwich City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: It's a must-win against Norwich to avoid relegation, admits Plymouth boss
arts.sum: Plymouth Argyle boss Miron Muslic says victory over Norwich City on Saturday is imperative if the strugglers are to escape Championship relegation.

arts.ttl: ‘Anything is possible’ – Plymouth Argyle vs Norwich City prediction: The72

arts.ttl: Preview: Plymouth Argyle vs. Norwich City - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Championship clash between Plymouth Argyle and Norwich City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
